history.proof: induction l. - simpl. apply Nat.le_refl. - destruct a. + simpl. strivial use: Nat.succ_le_mono, Nat.le_0_l, Nat.add_nonneg_nonneg, Nat.add_0_r. + simpl. srun best use: Nat.lt_le_trans, Nat.add_0_r, Nat.le_add_r unfold: lt.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros l. induction l. - simpl. apply Nat.le_refl. - destruct a. + simpl. apply Nat.le_succ. + simpl. apply Nat.le_succ.
